meta.tagline: See the patterns that shape your connections
meta.defaultTitle: Understand Your Relationship Patterns & Inner World
meta.defaultDescription: Withinly helps you recognize the patterns behind how you connect — with yourself and with others. Grounded in attachment theory, love languages, and mindfulness, it turns psychology into personal reflections you can actually feel.
meta.keywords: self-awareness, relationships, personal growth, emotional intelligence, attachment theory, love languages, mindfulness, conflict patterns

hero.headline: You're not broken. You're patterned.
hero.subheadline: Finally understand why you pull away when someone gets close, why small fights feel big, or why it’s hard to say what you need.
hero.tagline: Private reflections that turn your patterns into language you can use.

hook.headline: What You'll Discover
hook.tagline: No labels. No diagnoses. Just clear recognition.

discoveries.title: Language for patterns you've always felt but never named
discoveries.description: "I shut down when things get intense" stops being a flaw - it becomes a pattern you can recognize and work with.

discoveries.title: Clarity about how you connect and disconnect
discoveries.description: See how you show care, handle conflict, protect yourself, and what you need to feel safe.

discoveries.title: A private reflection space just for you
discoveries.description: Explore real situations and notice your habits in daily life with guidance that feels human and safe.

discoveries.title: Understanding of how your patterns meet
discoveries.description: If you have a partner, discover where you align, where you miss, and how to meet in the middle.

step1.title: Reflect
step1.description: Answer a few thoughtful questions about how you connect with yourself and others. They reveal the patterns beneath your reactions.

step2.title: Understand
step2.description: Your answers become a warm, personal reflection that explains your emotional patterns in clear, everyday language.

step3.title: Explore
step3.description: When something real comes up, ask your reflection companion what’s happening underneath. It responds like a wise friend who remembers your patterns.

step4.title: Connect
step4.description: When you're ready, invite your partner. Your reflections stay private — only shared insights reveal where you align, where you miss, and how to meet in the middle.

whyWithinly.headline: Why Withinly

items.title: Recognition, not labels
items.description: Language you can feel and use, without boxes.

items.title: Deeper than a quiz, lighter than therapy
Grows with you
items.description: From your first reflection to deeper portraits — at your pace.

whyWithinly.tagline: You don’t need fixing — you deserve understanding.

items.quote: I’ve been in therapy for years. This gave me insights my therapist and I are exploring together.
items.author: Early member

items.quote: The report on my relationship patterns made me cry — the good kind. I felt seen.
items.author: Beta tester

items.quote: It’s like a wise friend who remembers every conversation and helps me see the threads.
items.author: Premium member

triedBefore.headline: You've Tried to Understand Yourself Before
triedBefore.intro: You've explored ideas like attachment styles, communication habits, and love languages. They made sense in theory — but it's harder to see how they show up in real moments.
triedBefore.insight: What you've been missing is a reflection that speaks your language.
triedBefore.description: Withinly turns psychological ideas into something familiar and specific — moments you'll recognize from your own patterns.

testimonials.quote: For the first time, I could really name what I do when things get tense.
testimonials.author: Early access member

testimonials.quote: Seeing our shared rhythm made everything feel less personal and more understandable.
testimonials.author: Maya & Luis

pricing.headline: Fair exchange for meaningful insights

free.title: Free to start
features: Try conversations with your reflection companion
Explore Withinly at your own pace

premium.title: Simple pricing later
features: Early access includes a generous amount of free insights
Go deeper only if and when something feels meaningful
Pay only for what you choose to unlock

pricing.tagline: Pricing launches later. No commitment required — explore freely, with complete control over what you pay for.

earlyAccess.headline: Be among the first to see your patterns clearly
earlyAccess.description: We're opening Withinly to a small early group. Join our closed beta and be among the first to explore.
earlyAccess.urgency: No commitment. No pressure. Just gentle recognition of who you already are.

signup.headline: Ready to understand your patterns?
signup.description: Join the waitlist and be first to know when we open.
signup.privacy: We’ll send a personal note when doors open. No spam — ever.
signup.successMessage: Welcome! We’ll be in touch soon with your early access.
signup.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again or email us directly.

footer.tagline: Launching soon in English and Lithuanian

items.question: Is this therapy?
items.answer: No. Withinly helps you see your patterns — therapy helps you heal. Many therapists love when clients bring this kind of clarity.

items.question: What if I'm single?
items.answer: Perfect. Understanding your patterns now changes how you show up later.

items.question: How private is this?
items.answer: Your reflections stay yours. Even with partner sync, only shared insights are visible — never your individual answers or conversations.

items.question: How much will Withinly cost?
items.answer: You can start exploring for free. During early access, you'll receive a generous amount of insights to try the full experience. When we launch, deeper reflections and advanced features will be available as small, optional one-time purchases. No subscriptions. No hidden fees. You only pay for what feels meaningful to you.
